conditional_rules: IF descriptionType == 'manual' THEN SHOW parameter 'toolDescription'
IF resource == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'event' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'jsonParameters'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'create' AND jsonParameters == False THEN SHOW parameter 'dataAttributesUi'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'create' AND jsonParameters == True THEN SHOW parameter 'dataAttributesJson'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'alias' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'alias' THEN SHOW parameter 'newId'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'unsubscribe' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'resubscribe' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'addTags' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'addTags' THEN SHOW parameter 'tags'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'removeTags' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'removeTags' THEN SHOW parameter 'tags'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'track' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'track' THEN SHOW parameter 'email'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'track' THEN SHOW parameter 'eventName'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'track' THEN SHOW parameter 'jsonParameters'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'track' AND jsonParameters == False THEN SHOW parameter 'dataAttributesUi'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'track' AND jsonParameters == False THEN SHOW parameter 'extraAttributesUi'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'track' AND jsonParameters == True THEN SHOW parameter 'dataAttributesJson'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'track' AND jsonParameters == True THEN SHOW parameter 'extraAttributesJson'
